languages.text: "Незачем проливать благородную кровь, Вольный Торговец. Мы в меньшинстве, и прекрасно понимаем свое положение. Пока что... только пока что... мы вас покинем. Но если попробуете в будущем утаить от нас дитя — ждите беды".

traits.locale_text: "Незачем проливать благородную кровь, Вольный Торговец. Мы в меньшинстве, и прекрасно понимаем свое положение. Пока что... Только пока что... Мы вас покинем. Но если попрбуете утаить от нас дитя — ждите беды".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "There is no need to spill noble blood, Rogue Trader. We are outnumbered and understand our position all too well. We will take our leave of you for now... only for now. But try to hide the child from us in the future, and there will be trouble."
languages.original_text: "Незачем проливать благородную кровь, Вольный Торговец. Мы в меньшинстве, и прекрасно понимаем свое положение. Пока что... только пока что... мы вас покинем. Но если попробуете в будущем утаить от нас дитя — ждите беды".

traits.locale_text: "There is no need to spill noble blood, Rogue Trader. We are outnumbered and understand our position all to well. We will leave you for now... For now. But try to hide the child from us in the future, and there will be trouble."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "There is no need to spill noble blood, Rogue Trader. We are outnumbered and understand our position all to well. We will leave you for now... For now. But try to hide the child from us in the future, and there will be trouble."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "There is no need to spill noble blood, Rogue Trader. We are outnumbered and understand our position all too well. We will take our leave of you for now... only for now. But try to hide the child from us in the future, and there will be trouble."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "There is no need to spill noble blood, Rogue Trader. We are outnumbered and understand our position all too well. We will take our leave of you for now... only for now. But try to hide the child from us in the future, and there will be trouble."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "There is no need to spill noble blood, Rogue Trader. We are outnumbered and understand our position all too well. We will take our leave of you for now... only for now. But try to hide the child from us in the future, and there will be trouble."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “我们没必要在这里洒下贵族的鲜血，行商浪人。我们寡不敌众，而且我们非常明白自己的处境。我们会暂时离开……只是暂时离开而已。如果您以后依然不打算把这孩子还给我们，您恐怕就要有麻烦了。”
languages.original_text: "There is no need to spill noble blood, Rogue Trader. We are outnumbered and understand our position all too well. We will take our leave of you for now... only for now. But try to hide the child from us in the future, and there will be trouble."

traits.locale_text: “我们没必要在这里洒下贵族的鲜血，行商浪人。我们寡不敌众，而且我们非常明白自己的处境。我们会暂时离开……只是暂时离开而已。如果您以后依然不打算把这孩子还给我们，您恐怕就要有麻烦了。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «No es necesario derramar sangre noble, Comerciante Independiente. Nos supera en número y entendemos demasiado bien nuestra posición. Nos marcharemos por ahora... pero solo por ahora. Si intenta ocultarnos a la niña más adelante, tendremos problemas».
languages.original_text: "There is no need to spill noble blood, Rogue Trader. We are outnumbered and understand our position all too well. We will take our leave of you for now... only for now. But try to hide the child from us in the future, and there will be trouble."

traits.locale_text: «No es necesario derramar sangre noble, Comerciante Independiente. Nos supera en número y entendemos demasiado bien nuestra posición. Nos marcharemos por ahora... pero solo por ahora. Si intenta ocultarnos a la niña más adelante, tendremos problemas».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「高貴な血を流す必要はない、自由開拓者よ。我々は数で劣っており…立場を十分に理解している。今は別れるとしよう…今だけだが。しかし、将来、我々から子供を隠そうとすれば、面倒なことになるぞ」
languages.original_text: "There is no need to spill noble blood, Rogue Trader. We are outnumbered and understand our position all too well. We will take our leave of you for now... only for now. But try to hide the child from us in the future, and there will be trouble."

traits.locale_text: 「高貴な血を流す必要はない、自由開拓者よ。我々は数で劣っており…立場を十分に理解している。今は別れるとしよう…今だけだが。しかし、将来、我々から子供を隠そうとすれば、面倒なことになるぞ」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Es besteht kein Anlass, adliges Blut zu vergießen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir sind in der Unterzahl und verstehen Eure Haltung nur zu gut. Wir werden uns nun von Euch verabschieden ... aber nur für den Moment. Solltet Ihr hinkünftig versuchen, das Kind vor uns zu verbergen, wird es Ärger geben."
languages.original_text: "There is no need to spill noble blood, Rogue Trader. We are outnumbered and understand our position all too well. We will take our leave of you for now... only for now. But try to hide the child from us in the future, and there will be trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Es besteht kein Anlass, adliges Blut zu vergießen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Wir sind in der Unterzahl und verstehen Eure Haltung nur zu gut. Wir werden uns nun von Euch verabschieden ... aber nur für den Moment. Solltet Ihr hinkünftig versuchen, das Kind vor uns zu verbergen, wird es Ärger geben."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Inutile de faire couler le sang, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Nous sommes moins nombreux et avons parfaitement conscience de notre position. Nous allons donc prendre congé... pour le moment. Mais n'essayez pas de nous cacher l'Enfant à l'avenir, ou vous risqueriez de le regretter. »
languages.original_text: "There is no need to spill noble blood, Rogue Trader. We are outnumbered and understand our position all too well. We will take our leave of you for now... only for now. But try to hide the child from us in the future, and there will be trouble."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de faire couler le sang, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Nous sommes moins nombreux et avons parfaitement conscience de notre position. Nous allons donc prendre congé... pour le moment. Mais n'essayez pas de nous cacher l'enfant à l'avenir, ou vous risqueriez de le regretter. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Daha fazla kan dökmenin gereği yok Hür Tacir. Sayıca bizden üstünsünüz, bulunduğumuz konumu son derece iyi anlıyoruz. İsteklerinize şimdilik boyun eğiyoruz. Şimdilik. Çocuğu gelecekte bizden saklamaya çalışırsanız sorun yaşarız."
languages.original_text: "There is no need to spill noble blood, Rogue Trader. We are outnumbered and understand our position all too well. We will take our leave of you for now... only for now. But try to hide the child from us in the future, and there will be trouble."

traits.locale_text: "Daha fazla kan dökmenin gereği yok Hür Tacir. Sayıca bizden üstünsünüz ve sahip olduğunuz mevkiyi son derece iyi anlıyoruz. İsteklerinize şimdilik boyun eğiyoruz. Şimdilik. Çocuğu gelecekte bizden saklamaya çalışırsanız ama sorun yaşarız."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
